# Unwavering Resolve
## Scripture
"Hold fast the faithful word which is in accord with the teaching of Christ, so that he in being able to give instruction to others also will be able, full of the words of the faith and of the good doctrine which he has been instructed." â€“ 2 Timothy 1:13
## Reflection
In a world filled with distractions, uncertainty, and doubt, it's easy to waver in our faith. But as men of God, we're called to be steadfast and unwavering in our resolve to follow Him. The Apostle Paul, in his letter to Timothy, encourages us to hold fast to the faithful word of God. This means being deliberate and intentional in our daily lives, choosing to prioritize our relationship with Christ above all else. It means being a source of encouragement and instruction to those around us, even in the midst of chaos. Let us be men of conviction, men of faith, and men of unwavering resolve.
## Daily Challenge
"Do 20 squats while thanking God for the strength to stand firm."
